Your faith enhances your ability to remove conditions.

When you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Mercy], you can instead attempt to counteract the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Deafened], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed] conditions.
